metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's watch queue due to amissing lock in pipe_resize_ring(). The specific flaw exists within thehandling of pipe buffers. The issue results from the lack of proper lockingwhen performing operations on an object. This flaw allows a local user tocrash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.
